nodes.bodyText:
Ich entschuldige mich hierfür, es war sehr spät in der Nacht. ¯_(ツ)_/¯
Yes, I can english good very.

Probably best to use Arrays.asList
I can't see a reason why this should be done. Would be slower and means there's a mutable list (even if for a short time)
Check if this can be async first.
